## CI/CD é›†æˆ

### GitHub Actions

```yaml
# .github/workflows/ai-review.yml
name: AI Code Review
on: [pull_request]
jobs:
  review:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: AI Review
        run: |
          openclaw review --pr ${{ github.event.pull_request.number }}
